Kerry: Trump can't stop green energy revolution, but China coal threat loomsA re-elected Donald Trump won't stop renewable energy deployment, but could reverse anti-coal diplomacy efforts, U.S. Special Presidential Envoy for Climate John Kerry said on Tuesday at the International Energy Agency ministerial gathering. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 12:08:07 GMT FGVW6IM5FZMRHOSV4XXDZPDNVI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/kerry-trump-cant-stop-green-energy-revolution-china-coal-threat-looms-2024-02-13/Julia Payne, America Hernandez可持续发展气候与能源
Morning Bid: Nikkei and Nasdaq stalk records, CPI lurksA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Tue, 13 Feb 2024 11:15:10 GMT OXLY4TTGGRKNVIRSBR626OYMNI https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-13/Reuters市场
Exclusive: India IT ministry fears losing out to China, Vietnam in smartphone exports raceIndia risks losing out to China and Vietnam as it seeks to become a major smartphone export hub and must "act fast" to lure global companies with lower tariffs, the deputy IT minister said in government documents seen by Reuters. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 10:34:00 GMT QNZIK25RCFPMBE3GPZALGI4PTM https://www.reuters.com/technology/india-it-ministry-fears-losing-out-china-vietnam-smartphone-exports-race-2024-02-13/Aditya Kalra, Munsif Vengattil技术
Australia trade minister to ask China to lift barriers, query Wang sentenceAustralia's trade minister said on Tuesday he would meet his Chinese counterpart at a World Trade Organization conference in Abu Dhabi this month and push for the removal of restrictions on imported Australian wine, lobsters and meat. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 10:20:42 GMT OZQXSPSU2BPTTKCGRINTKQ2KIU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-trade-minister-ask-china-lift-barriers-query-wang-sentence-2024-02-13/Reuters市场宏观问题
Russia relying on old stocks after losing 3,000 tanks in Ukraine, leading military research centre saysRussia has lost more than 3,000 tanks during its invasion of Ukraine - the equivalent of its entire pre-war active inventory - but has enough lower-quality armoured vehicles in storage for years of replacements, a leading research centre said Tuesday. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 10:12:51 GMT HZL4DF6FWFNYNBFTQJWQOU2IEY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-relying-old-stocks-after-losing-3000-tanks-ukraine-leading-military-2024-02-13/Greg Torode世界欧洲
French wine and spirit exports fell last year on US hangoverFrench exports of wine and spirits fell last year from a post-COVID peak as inflation clipped consumer demand and distributors in the lucrative U.S. market cleared existing stocks, industry group FEVS said. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 09:32:40 GMT ZUISBC6CQZIZ3LQEL74WUKNU3Y https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/french-wine-spirit-exports-fell-last-year-us-hangover-2024-02-13/Gus Trompiz商业零售与消费品
